Mr. William G. Harley
October 30, 1962
Page #2
REGIONAL COUNCILS
Each NAEB Region shall have as its directional body a council composed of the
regional councilors elected by the state chapters of the region and the directors
elected at large from the region.
a. The regional council shall serve with the regional directors as
the governing body of regional business. The regional council
shall organize with a president, secretary and other desired
officers.
REGIONAL DIRECTORS
There shall be a regional director elected at large in each region to represent
the following categories of NAEB membership: television, radio, closed circuit
and individual.
a. The directors elected by the several regions in the several
categories shall constitute the NAEB Board of Directors.
With kindest personal regards, I am
Sincerely yours
RDH/ml
Director, Region II
